extension.searchTitle: EXECUTIVE SESSION; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 131

congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate confirmed the following nomination:<P/>By 50 yeas to 48 nays (Vote No. EX. 184), Marvin Kaplan, of Kansas, to be a Member of the National Labor Relations Board for the term of five years expiring August 27, 2020.<P/>During consideration of this nomination today, Senate also took the following action:<P/>By 50 yeas to 48 nays (Vote No. 183), Senate agreed to the motion to close further debate on the nomination.
